00055 #ifndef SC_BIT_IDS_H
00056 #define SC_BIT_IDS_H
00057 
00058 
00059 #include "sysc/utils/sc_report.h"
00060 
00061 
00062 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 //  Report ids (datatypes/bit)
00064 //
00065 //  Report ids in the range of 200-299.
00066 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 
00068 #ifndef SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE
00069 #define SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id,unused1,unused2) \
00070     namespace sc_core { extern SC_API const char id[]; }
00071 namespace sc_core {
00072     extern SC_API const char SC_ID_REGISTER_ID_FAILED_[]; // in sc_report_handler.cpp
00073 }
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 
00077 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_LENGTH_MISMATCH_, 200,
00078                 "length mismatch in bit/logic vector assignment" )
00079 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INCOMPATIBLE_TYPES_, 201,
00080                 "incompatible types" )
00081 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_CANNOT_CONVERT_, 202,
00082                 "cannot perform conversion" )
00083 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INCOMPATIBLE_VECTORS_, 203,
00084                 "incompatible vectors" )
00085 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_VALUE_NOT_VALID_, 204,
00086                 "value is not valid" )
00087 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_ZERO_LENGTH_,     205,
00088                 "zero length" )
00089 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_VECTOR_CONTAINS_LOGIC_VALUE_, 206,
00090                 "vector contains 4-value logic" )  
00091 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_SC_BV_CANNOT_CONTAIN_X_AND_Z_, 207,
00092                 "sc_bv cannot contain values X and Z" )
00093 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_VECTOR_TOO_LONG_,  208,
00094                 "vector is too long: truncated" )  
00095 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_VECTOR_TOO_SHORT_, 209,
00096                 "vector is too short: 0-padded" )  
00097 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_WRONG_VALUE_, 210,
00098                 "wrong value" )
00099 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_LOGIC_Z_TO_BOOL_, 211,
00100                 "sc_logic value 'Z' cannot be converted to bool" )
00101 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_LOGIC_X_TO_BOOL_, 212,
00102                 "sc_logic value 'X' cannot be converted to bool" )
00103 
00104 #endif
